description:
After two generous donors save Sanji from death by nosebleed, Luffy and Usopp take a tour of the island. But their welcome is worn out when a mystic mermaid has a terrifying vision - that Fish-Man Island will be destroyed at the hands of a Straw Hat!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`annihilation de l`île des Hommes-Poisson ?! La prédiction de Shirley !
The Fish-Man Island Will Be Annihilated?! Sharley`s Prophecy!
Остров Рыболюдей будет уничтожен?! Предсказание Шарли!
魚人島滅亡!? シャーリーの予言
